title: Another Day in Paradise: The Fourth Sherman's Lagoon Collection
description: "Some readers have likened the dubious regard for humans in "Sherman's Lagoon" to the late, lamented "Far Side" by Gary Larson."--"Dallas Morning News"Sharks have always fascinated Jim Toomey. "I was the only one rooting for the shark in "Jaws,"" he says. Now, Toomey's dim-witted Sherman is back with "Another Day in Paradise." This fantastic collection of the popular strip takes a satirical, sea-floor look at modern culture through the eyes of Sherman, his sidekick sea turtle friend Fillmore, and schools of other coral reef critters in their remote tropical paradise.
author: Jim Toomey
